full_summary:
### Government Tender Notice

#### Title
* English: Tender to Supply and Deliver Omni Seed Viper Pro 4 Kits
* French:Demande de soumission pour fournir et livrer deux trousses Omni Seed Viper Pro 4

#### Access Contract Details
Use Contract Registration Number: WS4332991891-Doc4348559936, on [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18270644?extsite=MTgyNzA2NDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Notice
Amendment to Tender Notice:
The tender closing date has been extended. All bids must be submitted by January 26, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contract Description
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires two (2) Omni Seed Viper Pro 4 kits to upgrade their existing Omni Seed lower-generation equipment. The contractor must supply and deliver the units to Lethbridge, Alberta.

#### Procurement Details
* Solicitation Number: WS4332991891
* Tender Closing Date: January 26, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 16, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: None

#### Contractor Eligibility
All contractors must have the exclusive rights to supply and deliver the requested equipment.

#### Selection Criteria
The contract will be awarded to the lowest-priced bidder.

#### Excluded Goods and Services
Only Canadian-produced goods and services are eligible.

#### Language of Contract
Both English and French are official languages of the contract.

#### Trade Agreements
The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

#### Tendering Process
The contract will be tendered through an open bidding process.

#### Contracting Agency Details
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), with a contact at:
Popp, Jared
Contact Information:
Jared.popp@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

_______
